text: Azosemide is a high-ceiling loop diuretic agent that was brought to market in 1981 by Boehringer Mannheim.Dieter Borman. Diuretics. Chapter 11 in Annual Reports in Medicinal Chemistry, Volume 15. Ed Hess, HJ.. Academic Press, 1980 As of 2015 it was available as a generic in some Asian countries.Drugs.com Drugs.com international listings for azosemide Page accessed July 12, 2015 ==References== Category:Diuretics Category:Tetrazoles Category:Sulfonamides Category:Thiophenes
title: Azosemide
